resources.string:
Our Method:
 -Others supervise, we teach
 -Support for parents
 -Regular assessments
 -Extra support for your child if they need it
 -Ability-based learning
-Process-driven so your child achieves their best
 


 At Pre Uni College, your child is in an environment for peak performance, and is certain to thrive.

EWMG Head Start Program\n Our EWMG Head start program is carefully designed for students studying from year one through to year six focusing on skills including English, writing, Mathematics and General ability
Selective School Trial Test\n Our Selective School mock Tests give your child the chance to perfect exam technique, build confidence and overcome exam day nerves before the big day!

OC Trial Test \n Our comprehensive OC Trial Test Course give children the opportunity to become confident in Maths, English and General ability. In addition, we ensure that they are developing the underlying skills needed to tackle the exam with confidence.

School Readiness\n Our School Readiness is designed to effectively prepare children to enter Kindergarten with confidence. Positive attitudes towards learning about language ensure that students are more likely to experience success in school and community settings
NAPLAN Preparation\n If your child is about to take the NAPLAN test,our preparation course just may give them the edge they need. We give your child the best opportunity to ACE the exam
